    • deleteDirectory

      public static boolean deleteDirectory(File directoryToBeDeleted)
      Delete a directory and all his content.
      If it's a folder it will call deleteDirectory on all sub file/folder and then destroy itself. If it's a file it will destroy itself.

      Download a file from the web.

      fileName - the name of the file were to save data from the web
      withInfo - if true launch a thread to have info during download

      public static void unzip(String fileName, String folderName)
      Unzip a zip file.
      cf https://www.baeldung.com/java-compress-and-uncompress
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the .zip file.
      folderName - the name of the folder were to save data from the .zip.

    • createZipEntry

      private static void createZipEntry(ZipEntry zipEntry, File destDir, ZipInputStream zis, String folderInURL) throws IOException
      Create a file for a zip entry. If file need to have it's parent folder created, it will do that to.
      cf https://www.baeldung.com/java-compress-and-uncompress
      Parameters:
      zipEntry - the zip entry to unzip
      folderName - destDir the folder where to create it
      ZipInputStream - the stream where to get content of the ZipEntry
      folderInURL - the folder to unzip from the url to exclude some folder of full path
      Throws:
      IOException

    • downloadAndUnzip

      public static boolean downloadAndUnzip(String url, String folderName, String folderInURL)
      Download and unzip a .zip from the web.
      With folderInURL we can download only part of the zip.
      Use this insted of download zip file and then unzip it will save performance. Because .zip file is never save on the disc, only in RAM.
      Parameters:
      url - the zip url
      folderName - destDir the folder where to create it
      folderInURL - the folder to unzip from the url to exclude some folders & files

    • downloadAndUnzip

      public static boolean downloadAndUnzip(String url, String folderName)
      Download and unzip a .zip from the web.
      Use this insted of download zip file and then unzip it will save performance. Because .zip file is never save on the disc, only in RAM.
      Parameters:
      url - the zip url
      folderName - destDir the folder where to create it

      Parameters:
      destinationDir - File that we whant to create in the zipEntry folder.
      zipEntry - the ZipEntry.
      Throws:
